PUBLIC TRANSIT INFORMATION SERVICE
GROUND SHUTTLE TRANSIT SYSTEM
The GBC Ground Shuttle Transit system offers a quick way to travel across the compound. The system consists of busses running every three minutes between four stops. The stations are located at the following locations:
-

A: Knight & 3rd Street (125s 206e)

B: Knight & 7th Street (139s 207e)

C: Market & 3rd Street (125s 224e)

D: Market & 7th Street (129s 224e)

USING A SHUTTLE:
Each station has two small green signs that state a destination in street names. To travel by shuttle, simply click on the sign showing your preferred destination. The next available bus will pick you up and transport you to your destination.
-
Shuttle stations and routes are shown on the map below. The Main Compound Map is also shown for comparison.
More information can be obtained by clicking on the MAP button, at the bottom of this page.
